english_example_sentence: When she doesn't wait for the late appointment, she goes to the beautiful park
russian_example_sentence: Когда она не ждет позднюю встречу, она идет в красивый парк
turkish_example_sentence: O geç randevuyu beklememediğinde, güzel parka gidiyor
